body: On Queer Africa: ...when I am asked to write on “queer Africa” or think about it, (the invitations rarely come, so this is hypothetical), I am asked to do “something” “impossible.”

title: Africa: Queer Africa: Pre-Writing, Writing, Re-Writing

sentence: On Queer Africa: ...when I am asked to write on “queer Africa” or think about it, (the invitations rarely come, so this is hypothetical), I am asked to do “something” “impossible.”
